Doing what every good Mama does. ..protect the kiddos.

Hey everyone, this season our organization is raising money for an animal shelter to save the homeless dogs in Macedonia. We've come up with a free way for everyone to help, please check out our video!
How is the human a creep? Because he wants to shake the puppy's paw? This is a common trick taught to many dogs, there's nothing "creepy" about it.

I am surprised by all the comments that say that the guy wants to eat the pup. I wonder if "eating" is all they can think of. Don't people eat sheep, goat, ducks and chickens? But there are many videos that show petting and cooing overs goats and ducks and chickens. Do you think of eating them all the time?
I hope they kept the puppy ., you can see the mom loves her!
If it was any other nationality I bet all you people would just be saying "Aw cute". The guy just wants his dog's pup to learn 'shake'.
It's Mother's Love. Please don't take away her baby...
She knows he drooling over her son meat
